required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long-term Follow-up of HIV Subjects Exposed to SB-728-T or SB-728mR-T
clinical_study.official_title: Long-Term Follow-up of HIV-Infected Subjects Treated With Autologous T-Cells Genetically Modified at the CCR5 Gene by Zinc Finger Nucleases (SB-728-T or SB-728mR-T)

brief_summary.textblock: Long-term follow-up of HIV-infected subjects who received SB-728-T or SB-728mR-T in a previous trial and completed 3 years of post-infusion follow-up. Enrolling subjects will be followed for a total of 12 years.

detailed_description.textblock:
Subjects infected with HIV who have received therapy with SB-728-T or SB-728mR-T and have completed 3 years of post-infusion follow-up will be eligible to participate in this trial. There will be no treatment in this long-term follow-up study. Subjects who choose to enroll into this extension study will be evaluated for a total of 12 years.
An optional leukapheresis may be performed upon sponsor request.

primary_outcome.measure: Long-term safety of treatment with SB-728-T or SB-728mR-T
primary_outcome.description: Number of subjects with delayed adverse events associated with administration of SB-728-T or SB-728mR-T, autologous T-cells genetically modified at the CCR5 gene by zinc finger nucleases.

secondary_outcome.measure: Long-term persistence of SB-728-T or SB-728mR-T
secondary_outcome.description: Long-term persistence of SB-728-T or SB-728mR-T will be measured by serial measurement of CCR5 gene modification.

other_outcome.description: Change in HIV reservoirs will be measured by serial measurement of HIV-1 RNA, HIV proviral DNA and HIV Co-receptor Tropism

arm_group.description: Long-term follow-up of HIV-infected subjects who received SB-728-T or SB-728mR-T in a previous trial.

intervention.description: Genetic: SB-728-T or SB-728mR-T No study drug is administered in this study. Subjects who received SB-728-T or SB-728mR-T in a previous trial will be evaluated in this trial for long-term safety and efficacy.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Subjects who have, in previous Sangamo clinical trial received SB-728-T or SB-728mR-T, autologous T-cells genetically modified at the CCR5 gene by zinc finger nucleases, have completed 3 years of post-infusion follow-up, and give consent to participate in the long-term follow-up study.
Exclusion Criteria:
There are no exclusion criteria for this study.
